item.title: I HAVE BEEN WORKING ON A NEW STREAMING SYSTEM CALLED ELEMENTUM. IT HAS MADE THINGS VERY BUGGY AND IM STILL FINDING WAYS TO MAKE IT WORK. THIS IS THE REASON FOR ALL THE ERRORS WITHIN EKC RECENTLY. ONCE I GET IT ALL TWEAKED THE WAY I WANT SO IT RUNS SMOOTHLY IM GOING TO RELEASE WITH EKC 29. I ALSO HAVE FOUND A GREAT SOURCE FOR FREE LIVE TV IN HD. STILL WORKING ON THE FINISHING TOUCHES BUT EVERYTHING WILL RUN VERY WELL WHEN IM DONE. ELEMENTUM PLAYS IN 1080P MOST OF THE TIME WITH NO BUFFERING AT ALL. EXCITING STUFF..
DONATIONS ARE ALWAYS VERY APPRECIATED-IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO DONATE YOU CAN AT PAYPAL.ME/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG - YOU CAN PURCHASE PRELOADED DEVICES AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM

SIGN UP FOR GEARS TV FOR A PREMIUM LIVE CONTENT. PLEASE WATCH THE DEMO VIDEO UNDER THE GEARS SECTION TO SEE IT IN ACTION. SIGN UP AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM/GEARSTV - THIS SERVICE IS AMAZING. GREAT GUIDE AS WELL.
THANK YOU ALL FOR YOUR SUPPORT. HAPPY STREAMING
IF YOU NEED ANY SUPPORT YOU CAN EMAIL ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG@GMAIL.COM OR MESSAGE US ON OUR FACEBOOK PAGE FACEBOOK.COM/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG
